V.iii.8.A.1.e
.
Considering SMC Associated With FSAD
Entitlement to SMC (k) for loss of use of a creative organ will be inferred and awarded whenever SC for FSAD is granted.
Note
:  If SC was previously established for FSAD but SMC was not awarded, place entitlement to SMC at issue and grant.  The effective date for the award of SMC will be the date SC for FSAD was established.
title: M21-1, Part V, Subpart iii, Chapter 8, Section A - Disabilities of the Gynecological System
citation: Part V, Subpart iii, Chapter 8, Section A
